name: Cattle Royale
description:
The WebGL is the version updated of the game

For the mini game jam 80

There's like a big blue arena where people to go fight for the death. 
To be honest no one kinda knows why people go there and die.

Whatever it's really epic so let's just go in the arena and win :)

A mini-game arena fighter, can be played solo or with other people (4 max in local, you can use parsec)

Rule :
In the arena, you have some bonus which will provide you a super weapon.
Becarful, barrel can explode and in general, it's pretty chaotic.

Game :
Time mode : kill maximum of your ennemies in the limited time
Life mode : survive and try to kill the other with a limited number of life

Weapons :
Normal : Low damage and medium firerate, pretty weak
Fireball : High damage with zone, low firerate and low speed on bullet
Ice : Medium damage and firerate, slow down the ennemies
Lightning : Low damage, very high firerate, can go through obstacle
Rock : Short range but fire triple bullet, medium damage for one rock, medium firerate

Control :
Escape : Pause menu
Space / Back Trigger : Dash (invincible during the dash)
Mouse + Left Click / Left joystick : Fire

Hope you will enjoy our game !

Try to beat my personnal score (5-4-1 time mode with AI 1v3)
